meanings.sent1: I have quatre apples in my basket.
meanings.sent3: The four friends decided to split the pizza into quatre equal parts.
meanings.sent4: The quatre corners of the room were brightly lit.
meanings.sent5: The quatre seasons bring different weather changes.

meanings.definition: A card with four spots or pips.
meanings.sent1: In the deck, I drew a quatre of hearts.
meanings.sent2: She placed the quatre of spades on the table.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out the quatre of diamonds from his sleeve.
meanings.sent4: The quatre on the card was beautifully illustrated.
meanings.sent5: The quatre on the playing card was slightly worn from use.

meanings.definition: A figure or design with four points or parts.
meanings.sent1: The logo featured a quatre-leaf clover.
meanings.sent2: The quatre-pointed star shone brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The quatre on the compass pointed north.
meanings.sent4: The quatre on the map marked the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The quatre on the emblem symbolized unity.
